channel.title: Contacts and Supporting the Gauntlet
channel.description:
For all things related to Gauntlet Publishing-- Codex, The Gauntlet Publishing Discord, our Kickstarters, Brindlewood Bay & other publications, you can email gauntletpublish@gmail.com or message on Twitter @gauntletpub.
For things related to the Gauntlet Gaming Calendar, Gauntlet Community, Gauntlet Slack, Blog, and Podcasts you can email gauntletcommunity@gmail.com or message on Twitter @gauntletrpg
You can find The Gauntlet website, with links to all our resources, blog, and general information at gauntlet-rpg.com
If you'd like to support the work we do here, you can support The Gauntlet via our Patreon https://www.patreon.com/gauntlet
OUr Facebook Group is here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/gauntlet.rpg Our YouTube Channel is here: https://www.youtube.com/c/TheGauntletRPG
You can find our Community Code of Conduct here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html
You'll find pdf releases of Gauntlet publications on DTRPG: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/browse/pub/12676/The-Gauntlet You can find Gauntlet physical releases here: https://www.indiepressrevolution.com/xcart/The-Gauntlet/

item.title: Contacts and Supporting the Gauntlet
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

For all things related to Gauntlet Publishing-- Codex, The Gauntlet Publishing Discord, our Kickstarters, Brindlewood Bay & other publications, you can email gauntletpublish@gmail.com or message on Twitter @gauntletpub.

For things related to the Gauntlet Gaming Calendar, Gauntlet Community, Gauntlet Slack, Blog, and Podcasts you can email gauntletcommunity@gmail.com or message on Twitter @gauntletrpg

You can find The Gauntlet website, with links to all our resources, blog, and general information at gauntlet-rpg.com

If you’d like to support the work we do here, you can support The Gauntlet via our Patreon https://www.patreon.com/gauntlet

OUr Facebook Group is here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/gauntlet.rpg
Our YouTube Channel is here: https://www.youtube.com/c/TheGauntletRPG

You can find our Community Code of Conduct here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html

You’ll find pdf releases of Gauntlet publications on DTRPG: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/browse/pub/12676/The-Gauntlet
You can find Gauntlet physical releases here: https://www.indiepressrevolution.com/xcart/The-Gauntlet/
